# Q003 Earth Rotation
^question Q003
^type true_false

^labels #Science #Astronomy #Remember #Easy

@field: question_text
The Earth rotates around its axis once every 24 hours.
@end_field

@field: options
^True_label True
^False_label False
A. True
B. False
@end_field

@field: answer
A
@end_field

@field: feedback

@@field: general_feedback
The Earth takes approximately 24 hours (23 hours, 56 minutes) to complete one rotation.
@@end_field

@@field: correct_feedback
Correct! The Earth rotates once every 24 hours.
@@end_field

@@field: incorrect_feedback

@@end_field
